financial-services-ai.title: Financial Services - AI & Data Transformation
financial-services-ai.description: Recommended modules for financial services prospects exploring AI and data modernization

modules.notes: Start with company introduction to establish credibility and set context for all follow-up communications.
Follow with specific Data & AI practice introduction - establish comprehensive capabilities in target area.
Build foundation understanding - most AI/data initiatives require modern architecture as prerequisite.
Address the compliance elephant in the room early - critical for financial services trust.
Introduce specific AI solutions after foundation and compliance are established.
Provide concrete proof point with specific ROI - builds confidence in execution capability.
Second success story shows breadth of AI applications in financial services context.
End with execution capability and talent - shows how we deliver on the promises made earlier.

healthcare-cloud.title: Healthcare - Cloud Infrastructure Modernization
healthcare-cloud.description: Recommended modules for healthcare organizations moving to cloud

manufacturing-app-dev.title: Manufacturing - Application Development
manufacturing-app-dev.description: Recommended modules for manufacturing companies seeking to modernize their application landscape.
